description: President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa assists the women as their kayak capsizes amid strong currents.
title: Portugal president helps rescue two women in trouble at sea
title_page: Portugal president helps rescue two women in trouble at sea - BBC News
maintext: "As there is a very large west current, they were dragged out, turned around, swallowed a lot of water and were not even able to turn [the kayak], nor to climb [on it], or swim, such is the strength of the current," he told local media.
